text.__SUMMARY__: Guzmania sanguinea is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. This species is native to Trinidad & Tobago, Costa Rica (including Costa Rican islands in the Pacific), Panama, Colombia, Venezuela, Ecuador, and northern Brazil.
text.Varieties:
Three varieties are recognized:
Guzmania sanguinea var. brevipedicellata Gilmartin - Ecuador
Guzmania sanguinea var. comosa H.E.Luther - Colombia, Ecuador
Guzmania sanguinea var. sanguinea - most of species range
text.Cultivars:
Guzmania 'Colombian Gold'
Guzmania 'Hades'
Guzmania 'Pink Nova'
Guzmania 'Tricolor'
